title: Publication of Children s Social Care Statistics for Northern Ireland 2014/15 (Department of Health, Social ...
text: ( Source : Department of Health , Social Services and Public Safety ) The Department of Health , Social Services and Public Safety has today published the ' Children 's Social Care Statistics for Northern Ireland 2014/15'. ~ Thursday, 15 October
